DESCRIPTION: Your total hand is your hand plus your #yOverdraw.

At the start of each turn, draw 1 extra card for each Speed and gain negative effects based on your Speed. NL 3+: Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL 5+: Lose 2 Dexterity this turn only. NL 7+: Lose 2 Traction this turn only.
Draw 1 less card at the start of your next turn for each #yBrake.
At the end of your turn, gain Block and deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP equal to your #yDrift. When you #yDrift, gain #yMomentum (Max 2.) which maintains your #yDrift.
If you hand is not full, you lose 1 #yOverdraw and draw 1 card until it is.
Gain 2 Strength. Lose 2 Dexterity. Gain 1 speed.
Gain 10 Block. Gain 2 Dexterity. Lose 2 Strength. Lose 1 Speed.
Gain Block and deal damage to the lowest HP enemy equal to your #yDrift.
